attributes.action: Ensure that Gordon Strachan is not sacked as manager of Celtic Football Club.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Strachan should not be sacked as manager of Celtic Football Club for the following reasons:-

1. He looks like Chesney from Coronation Street.
2. As he has ginger hair his sacking may constitute unfair dismissal on the grounds of disability discrimination.
3. Snow White and the rest of the dwarfs don't want him to come home.
4. He hasn't managed to win an away match in the Champions League yet.
 
On these grounds any attempt to remove Mr Strachan from his current position of employment would be unjust.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
